Addons.ExecuteAddon.description: Executes the given addon with the given parameters (if possible)

type.description: URL path (must start with / or ?

Addons.GetAddonDetails.description: Gets the details of a specific addon

params.description: Content provided by the addon. Only considered for plugins and scripts.
params.name: content

Application.GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

AudioLibrary.Clean.description: Cleans the audio library from non-existent items

params.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog
params.name: showdialogs

AudioLibrary.Export.description: Exports all items from the audio library

path.description: Path to the directory to where the data should be exported

images.description: Whether to export thumbnails and fanart images

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite existing exported files

AudioLibrary.GetAlbumDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific album

AudioLibrary.GetAlbums.description: Retrieve all albums from specified artist (and role) or that has songs of the specified genre

genreid.description: Song genre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

genre.description: Song genre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

params.description: Whether or not to include all roles when filtering by artist, rather than the default of excluding other contributions. When true it overrides any role filter value.
params.name: allroles

AudioLibrary.GetArtistDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific artist

AudioLibrary.GetArtists.description: Retrieve all artists. For backward compatibility by default this implicity does not include those that only contribute other roles, however absolutely all artists can be returned using allroles=true

params.description: Whether or not to only include album artists rather than the artists of only individual songs as well. If the parameter is not passed or is passed as null the GUI setting will be used
params.name: albumartistsonly

genreid.description: Deprecated, use songgenreid. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

songgenreid.description: Song genreid. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

genre.description: Deprecated, use songgenre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

songgenre.description: Song genre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

roleid.description: Role contributed by artist. Overridden by allroles parameter

role.description: Role contributed by artist. Overridden by allroles parameter

params.description: Whether or not to include all artists irrespective of the role they contributed. When true it overrides any role filter value.
params.name: allroles

AudioLibrary.GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the music library properties

params.description: The amount of recently added albums from which to return the songs
params.name: albumlimit

AudioLibrary.GetSongDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific song

AudioLibrary.GetSongs.description: Retrieve all songs from specified album, artist or genre

genreid.description: Song genre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

genre.description: Song genre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

params.description: Whether or not to include all roles when filtering by artist, rather than default of excluding other contributors. When true it overrides any role filter value.
params.name: allroles

AudioLibrary.Scan.description: Scans the audio sources for new library items

params.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog
params.name: showdialogs

AudioLibrary.SetAlbumDetails.description: Update the given album with the given details

AudioLibrary.SetArtistDetails.description: Update the given artist with the given details

AudioLibrary.SetSongDetails.description: Update the given song with the given details

Favourites.AddFavourite.description: Add a favourite with the given details

params.description: Required for media and script favourites types
params.name: path

params.description: Required for window favourite type
params.name: window

Files.GetDirectory.description: Get the directories and files in the given directory

params.description: Limits are applied after getting the directory content thus retrieval is not faster when they are applied.
params.name: limits

Files.GetFileDetails.description: Get details for a specific file

params.description: Full path to the file
params.name: file

Files.GetSources.description: Get the sources of the media windows

Files.PrepareDownload.description: Provides a way to download a given file (e.g. providing an URL to the real file location)

details.description: Transport specific details on how/from where to download the given file

mode.description: Direct mode allows using Files.Download whereas redirect mode requires the usage of a different protocol

Files.SetFileDetails.description: Update the given specific file with the given details

params.description: Full path to the file
params.name: file

params.description: File type to update correct database. Currently only "video" is supported.
params.name: media

params.description: Setting a valid lastplayed without a playcount will force playcount to 1.
params.name: lastplayed

GUI.GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

GUI.GetStereoscopicModes.description: Returns the supported stereoscopic modes of the GUI

GUI.SetStereoscopicMode.description: Sets the stereoscopic mode of the GUI to the given mode

params.description: The time in milliseconds the notification will be visible
params.name: displaytime

Input.Home.description: Goes to home window in GUI

params.description: Unicode text
params.name: text

params.description: Whether this is the whole input or not (closes an open input dialog if true).
params.name: done

Input.ShowCodec.description: Show codec information of the playing item

Input.ShowOSD.description: Show the on-screen display for the current player

Input.ShowPlayerProcessInfo.description: Show player process information of the playing item, like video decoder, pixel format, pvr signal strength, ...

getreferences.description: Whether or not to print the schema for referenced types

id.description: Name of a namespace, method or type

type.description: Type of the given name

major.description: Bumped on backwards incompatible changes to the API definition

minor.description: Bumped on backwards compatible additions/changes to the API definition

patch.description: Bumped on any changes to the internal implementation but not to the API definition

PVR.AddTimer.description: Adds a timer to record the given show one times or a timer rule to record all showings of the given show

params.description: the broadcast id of the item to record
params.name: broadcastid

params.description: controls whether to create a timer rule or a onetime timer
params.name: timerrule

PVR.DeleteTimer.description: Deletes a onetime timer or a timer rule

params.description: the id of the onetime timer or timer rule to delete
params.name: timerid

PVR.GetBroadcastDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific broadcast

PVR.GetBroadcasts.description: Retrieves the program of a specific channel

PVR.GetChannelDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific channel

PVR.GetChannelGroupDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific channel group

PVR.GetChannelGroups.description: Retrieves the channel groups for the specified type

PVR.GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

PVR.GetRecordingDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific recording

PVR.GetTimerDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific timer

PVR.ToggleTimer.description: Creates or deletes a onetime timer or timer rule for a given show. If it exists, it will be deleted. If it does not exist, it will be created

params.description: the broadcast id of the item to toggle a onetime timer or time rule for
params.name: broadcastid

params.description: controls whether to create / delete a timer rule or a onetime timer
params.name: timerrule

Player.GetPlayers.description: Get a list of available players

Player.GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

Player.GoTo.description: Go to previous/next/specific item in the playlist

type.description: position in playlist

Player.Move.description: If picture is zoomed move viewport left/right/up/down otherwise skip previous/next

Player.Open.description: Start playback of either the playlist with the given ID, a slideshow with the pictures from the given directory or a single file or an item from the database.

random.description: Deprecated, use the shuffled property of the options parameter instead

type.description: Path to a smartplaylist (*.xsp) file
name of player
Whether to resume from the resume point or not
Percentage value to start from
Time to start from

Player.PlayPause.description: Pauses or unpause playback and returns the new state

type.description: Percentage value to seek to
Time to seek to
Seek by predefined jumps

seconds.description: Seek by the given number of seconds

Player.SetAudioStream.description: Set the audio stream played by the player

type.description: Index of the audio stream to play

Player.SetRepeat.description: Set the repeat mode of the player

Player.SetSpeed.description: Set the speed of the current playback

Player.SetSubtitle.description: Set the subtitle displayed by the player

type.description: Index of the subtitle to display

params.description: Whether to enable subtitles to be displayed after setting the new subtitle
params.name: enable

Player.SetVideoStream.description: Set the video stream played by the player

type.description: Index of the video stream to play
zoom level

Playlist.GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

Playlist.Insert.description: Insert item(s) into playlist. Does not work for picture playlists (aka slideshows).

Playlist.Remove.description: Remove item from playlist. Does not work for picture playlists (aka slideshows).

Playlist.Swap.description: Swap items in the playlist. Does not work for picture playlists (aka slideshows).

params.description: Profile name

params.description: Prompt for password

Settings.GetSettingValue.description: Retrieves the value of a setting

System.EjectOpticalDrive.description: Ejects or closes the optical disc drive (if available)

System.Hibernate.description: Puts the system running Kodi into hibernate mode

XBMC.GetInfoBooleans.description: Retrieve info booleans about Kodi and the system

returns.description: Object containing key-value pairs of the retrieved info booleans

Application.OnVolumeChanged.description: The volume of the application has changed.

AudioLibrary.OnCleanFinished.description: The audio library has been cleaned.

AudioLibrary.OnCleanStarted.description: An audio library clean operation has started.

AudioLibrary.OnExport.description: An audio library export has finished.

AudioLibrary.OnRemove.description: An audio item has been removed.

transaction.description: True if the removal is being performed within a transaction.

AudioLibrary.OnScanFinished.description: Scanning the audio library has been finished.

AudioLibrary.OnScanStarted.description: An audio library scan has started.

AudioLibrary.OnUpdate.description: An audio item has been updated.

added.description: True if the update is for a newly added item.

transaction.description: True if the update is being performed within a transaction.

Input.OnInputFinished.description: The user has provided the requested input.

Input.OnInputRequested.description: The user is requested to provide some information.

Player.OnPause.description: Playback of a media item has been paused. If there is no ID available extra information will be provided.

Player.OnPlay.description: Playback of a media item has been started or the playback speed has changed. If there is no ID available extra information will be provided.

Player.OnPropertyChanged.description: A property of the playing items has changed.

Player.OnSeek.description: The playback position has been changed. If there is no ID available extra information will be provided.

Player.OnSpeedChanged.description: Speed of the playback of a media item has been changed. If there is no ID available extra information will be provided.

Player.OnStop.description: Playback of a media item has been stopped. If there is no ID available extra information will be provided.

end.description: Whether the player has reached the end of the playable item(s) or not

Playlist.OnAdd.description: A playlist item has been added.

Playlist.OnClear.description: A playlist item has been cleared.

Playlist.OnRemove.description: A playlist item has been removed.

System.OnLowBattery.description: The system is on low battery.

System.OnWake.description: The system woke up from suspension.

VideoLibrary.OnCleanFinished.description: The video library has been cleaned.

VideoLibrary.OnCleanStarted.description: A video library clean operation has started.

VideoLibrary.OnExport.description: A video library export has finished.

VideoLibrary.OnRemove.description: A video item has been removed.

transaction.description: True if the removal is being performed within a transaction.

VideoLibrary.OnScanFinished.description: Scanning the video library has been finished.

VideoLibrary.OnScanStarted.description: A video library scan has started.

VideoLibrary.OnUpdate.description: A video item has been updated.

added.description: True if the update is for a newly added item.

transaction.description: True if the update is being performed within a transaction.

items.description: The various roles contributed by an artist to one or more songs
The artist and the role they contribute to a song
Requesting the songgenres and/or artistid field will result in increased response times
Requesting the (song)genreid/genre, or roleid/role fields will result in increased response times
Requesting the genreid, artistid and/or albumartistid field will result in increased response times

size.description: Size of the file in bytes

end.description: Index of the last item to return

start.description: Index of the first item to return

type.description: An unknown item does not have any additional information.
An item known to the database has an identification.
A movie item has a title and may have a release year.
A tv episode has a title and may have an episode number, season number and the title of the show it belongs to.
A music video has a title and may have an album and an artist.
A song has a title and may have an album, an artist and a track number.
A picture has a file path.
A PVR channel is either a radio or tv channel and has a title.

file.description: Path to a file (not a directory) to be added to the playlist

genreid.description: Identification of a genre from the AudioLibrary

lasthashcheck.description: Last time source was checked for changes

items.description: Requesting the cast, ratings, streamdetails, uniqueid and/or tag field will result in increased response times
Requesting the cast, ratings, showlink, streamdetails, uniqueid and/or tag field will result in increased response times
Requesting the streamdetails and/or tag field will result in increased response times
Requesting the cast, ratings, uniqueid and/or tag field will result in increased response times
